data.body: Rishi Hiranyastupa Angiras's Mantra on Agni recited in Jagati Chhand meter.
प्रथमं मण्डलमं, अनु ७, ३१ सूक्तम् ऋषि: हरिण्यस्तुप आन्गिरासः छन्द: जगती अग्निः देव
त्वमग्ने यज्यवे पायुरन्तरोऽनिषङगाय चतुरक्ष इध्यसे । यो रातहव्योऽवृकाय धायसे कीरेश्चिन मन्त्रं मनसा वनोषि तम ॥
tvamagne yajyave payuh antarah anisanghaya chatuh-a-aksa idhyase; yah rat-a-havyah avrkaya dhayase kirescin mantram manasa vanosi tam.

tvam agne (you agni) yajyave (act of sacrifice) payuh (payu - protector, internal) antarah anisanghaya (anisam - incessant) catuh-a-aksa (clever protection) idhyase (indeed); yah (this) rat-a-havyah (ratahavya - receiving the oblation) avrkaya (avrk - not hurting, safe) dhayase (strengthening) kirescin (plant) mantram (mantra) manasa vanosi (swift as thought) tam (you)
